creator: abhijith@britekindia.com
text:
We are running Tomcat 5.0.25 on a Windows 2003 server.Our application will 
connect to different ip cameras and stream MJPEG streamds convert onto JPEG 
images and stored in FTP locations.Thus tomcat will have to connect to these 
cameras and ftp servers to do the task.we have maxi of 18 cameras.But tomcat 
service is failing after some time.The error reported on Event Viwer (Win2003)

System Tab
The Apache Tomcat service terminated unexpectedly.  It has done this 3 time(s).

Application Tab
Faulting application tomcat5.exe, version 1.0.0.0, faulting module 
kernel32.dll, version 5.2.3790.0, fault address 0x000017b1.

This is not nearly enough information to reproduce or fix the problem.  It's 
not even enough information to blame tomcat, as the reason for the fault might 
be in your code, the service configuration, windows, etc.  I'm closing this 
item as invalid.  Please feel free to discuss your issue on the tomcat-user 
list.  If it turns out to be a real tomcat bug, open a Bugzilla issue for it 
with clear steps to reproduce as well as complete configuration and error log 
information.
creator: yoavs@computer.org

text:
I found this bug while googling around for a similar problem in another application and I'm updating this 
as a service to anyone else that has run into this with Tomcat.

The bug seems to be in Windows Server 2003 and is fixed with Service Pack 1.
